name: Inefable (Iván Moreno)
description:
An open world game in which your mission is to defeat the strongest monster in the world!

  • Visit 4 biomes and collect items to prepare the strongest potions!
  • Study the boss and discover what his weakness is!
  • Talk with other wizards and buy or sell your creations!
  • Craft, craft, craft!!!

This is my first game made from scratch, everything was made by myself (music included).
